fruitbasket.name: Apple
fruitbasket.description: Apples are sweet, edible fruits produced by an apple tree. Apple trees are cultivated worldwide and are the most widely grown species in the genus Malus.

fruitbasket.name: Banana
fruitbasket.description: Bananas are one of the most popular fruits worldwide. They contain essential nutrients that can have a protective impact on health.

fruitbasket.name: Orange
fruitbasket.description: Oranges are a type of low calorie, highly nutritious citrus fruit. As part of a healthy and varied diet, they contribute to strong clear skin and can help to lower the risk of many conditions.

fruitbasket.name: Strawberry
fruitbasket.description: Strawberries are bright red, juicy, and sweet. They are an excellent source of vitamin C and manganese and also contain decent amounts of folate (vitamin B9) and potassium.

fruitbasket.name: Blueberry
fruitbasket.description: Blueberries are sweet, nutritious, and wildly popular. Often labeled a superfood, they are low in calories and incredibly good for you.

fruitbasket.name: Mango
fruitbasket.description: Mangoes are juicy stone fruit from numerous species of tropical trees. They are known for their sweet taste and are a rich source of vitamins A and C.

fruitbasket.name: Pineapple
fruitbasket.description: Pineapples are tropical fruit that are rich in vitamins, enzymes, and antioxidants. They may help boost the immune system, build strong bones, and aid indigestion.

fruitbasket.name: Grapes
fruitbasket.description: Grapes are a type of fruit that grows in clusters and can be various colors such as green, red, black, yellow, pink, and purple. They are a good source of fiber, potassium, and a range of vitamins and other minerals.

fruitbasket.name: Watermelon
fruitbasket.description: Watermelons are large, sweet fruits with a high water content. They are a good source of vitamin C and contain antioxidants like lycopene, which may have several health benefits.

fruitbasket.name: Kiwi
fruitbasket.description: Kiwis are small fruits that pack a lot of flavor and plenty of health benefits. Their green flesh is sweet and tangy and rich in nutrients such as vitamin C, vitamin K, vitamin E, folate, and potassium.

fruitbasket.name: Peach
fruitbasket.description: Peaches are juicy and versatile summer fruits that are native to Northwest China. They can be eaten on their own or used in a variety of dishes.

fruitbasket.name: Cherry
fruitbasket.description: Cherries are small stone fruits that come in a variety of colors and flavors. They are not only delicious but also pack vitamins, minerals, and plant compounds with powerful health effects.

fruitbasket.name: Papaya
fruitbasket.description: Papayas are tropical fruits high in vitamins C and A, fiber, and healthy plant compounds. They have antioxidant properties and can help improve digestion.

fruitbasket.name: Plum
fruitbasket.description: Plums are stone fruits with a sweet-tart flavor. They are low in calories but contain several vitamins and minerals. They can also be dried into prunes.

fruitbasket.name: Pear
fruitbasket.description: Pears are sweet, bell-shaped fruits that have been enjoyed since ancient times. They are a good source of dietary fiber and antioxidants.

fruitbasket.name: Lemon
fruitbasket.description: Lemons are a popular fruit that people use in small quantities to add flavor to food. They are rarely consumed alone due to their sour taste.

fruitbasket.name: Avocado
fruitbasket.description: Avocados are a unique fruit known for their creamy texture and rich flavor. They are high in healthy fats, especially monounsaturated fat, which can support heart health.

fruitbasket.name: Coconut
fruitbasket.description: Coconuts are highly nutritious and rich in fiber, vitamins, and minerals. The water and meat inside the coconut can be consumed in various forms.

fruitbasket.name: Lychee
fruitbasket.description: Lychees are tropical fruits known for their sweet and floral flavor. They are rich in vitamin C and various antioxidants, and are often used in desserts and drinks.

fruitbasket.name: Pomegranate
fruitbasket.description: Pomegranates are rich in antioxidants and nutrients. They have anti-inflammatory properties and can help improve heart health.

fruitbasket.name: Guava
fruitbasket.description: Guavas are tropical fruits with a unique flavor and numerous health benefits. They are exceptionally rich in vitamin C and dietary fiber.
